meta.title: What's new in Vert.x 4.2
meta.summary: See an overview of all new and exciting features in Vert.x 4.2, including Java 17 support, Vert.x Oracle Client and more.

meta.title: Migrate from Vert.x 3 to Vert.x 4
meta.summary: We provide a clear and well-documented migration path from Vert.x 3.9 to Vert.x 4. Existing users will feel at home with the new version.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.9.11 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 3.9.11 has just been released.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.1.7 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 4.1.7 has just been released.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.2.2 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 4.2.2 has just been released.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x and Log4j 2 CVE-2021-44228
meta.summary: A recent CVE-2021-44228 has been disclosed that affects the Log4j 2 library. The Vert.x project can optionally use Log4j but does not ship it and therefore is not affected by this CVE.
